title: Create a 'Behind the Scenes' Social Post
description: To build a connection with the audience, a reporter posts a 'behind the scenes' photo or video from their reporting process.

tasks.description: While on assignment, take a photo or short video that shows the reporting process (e.g., a photo of their notebook, a view from the press box).
tasks.expected_outcome: An interesting behind-the-scenes asset is captured.

tasks.description: Write a caption that gives a small insight into the process of journalism.
tasks.expected_outcome: An engaging and informative caption is written.

tasks.description: Post the content to a platform like Instagram or Twitter.
